[旨]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 匕 a spoon ( 匙 ) to eat or drink something delicious. The original version is 𠤔 . See 嘗 . Similar but unrelated to 皀 .
According to the Shuowen : phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *kjiʔ ): phonetic 匕 ( OC *pilʔ ) + semantic 甘 ( “ delicious ” ) .

[皀]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) - a bowl of rice on a stand. The pictogram is part of the radical 食 . Unrelated to 良 and 旨 .

[良]
Pictogram ( 象形 ). Possibly depicts corridors and a room, in which case it would be the original form of 廊 . See also the top component of 复 . Unrelated to 食 , 艮 and 即 .

[艮]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 目 ( “ eye ” ) + 人 ( “ person ” ) — a person looking back ( Ji Xusheng, 2004 ) to introduce the concept of disobedience and/or limit. Similar but unrelated to 見 .
